title: Requires a specific recommendation by a certified psychologist or a certified nurse practitioner of the type of residence in which a patient is to live upon release
summary: Requires a specific recommendation by a certified psychologist or a certified nurse practitioner of the type of residence in which a patient is to live upon release into the community.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the discharge and release of patients into the community
